title: Leading deodorant brands ranked by sales value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories for the x axis representing Brand, and a y axis representing Sales in million GBP.
The highest category is found at Male_Lynx where Sales in million GBP is 98.0.
The lowest category is found at Female_Dove where Sales in million GBP is 57.6.
